name: Create 100k Records in Salesforce
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

input.object_name: voya/sf-opptys-bulk-crete/Voya_ Bulk Input to Salesforce - Bulk Records.csv

extended_input_schema.name: region
extended_input_schema.label: Region
extended_input_schema.hint: Go to Bucket>Properties>Static website hosting to find your region in the 'Endpoint' URL, e.g. us-west-2

extended_input_schema.name: object_name
extended_input_schema.label: Object name
extended_input_schema.hint: Exact, case sensitive name of the object/file

extended_input_schema.name: size
extended_input_schema.label: Size
extended_input_schema.hint: Limit of how many bytes to retrieve

extended_input_schema.name: accelerate
extended_input_schema.label: Use accelerated endpoint
extended_input_schema.hint: Default is false. Enter true to use accelerated endpoint. Go to Bucket>Properties>Transfer acceleration to check if accelerated endpoint is enabled

extended_input_schema.name: chunk_size
extended_input_schema.label: Download chunk size in kilobytes
extended_input_schema.hint: Download this many kilobytes at a time. Default is 1024 (1MB), minimum is 32 (KB)

block.name: insert_bulk_job
block.title: Create Opportunities in bulk from CSV file
block.description: Create Opportunities in bulk in Salesforce from CSV file

extended_input_schema.name: records
extended_input_schema.label: CSV to Salesforce Opportunities field mapping

properties.label: Wait for Salesforce to process all CSV rows?
properties.hint: When Yes, action will return once Salesforce processes all the rows in the CSV file. When No, action will return once the CSV file is uploaded to Salesforce.
properties.name: wait_to_complete

properties.label: CSV chunk size for each Salesforce bulk job (in MB)
properties.hint:
If the CSV file is greater than the chunk size, this action will automatically create multiple Salesforce bulk jobs.
Defaults to 100MB.
properties.name: csv_chunk_size
